input.sentences: the family got together for a family reunion .
mom and daughter were very happy .
the sisters were excited to see each other .
output.sentences: Today was Genie's first baby shower.
All of her friends, family, and loved ones showed up.
She took pictures with her mother.
She posted with her sister, toom
Genie's mother gave a very special gift for the nursery: a picture of Genie as a small child in a baby carrier.
